title: A briefe declaratio[n] of the shews, deuices, speeches, and inuentions, done & performed before the Queenes Maiestie, & the French ambassadours, at the most valiaunt and worthye triumph, attempted and executed on the Munday and Tuesday in VVhitson weeke last, anno 1581 Collected, gathered, penned & published, by Henry Goldvvel, Gen.
author: Goldwel, Henry.
publisher: By Robert VValdgraue, dwelling vvithout Temple-barre, neere vnto Sommerset-House,
notes: Running title reads: A declaration of the triumph shewed before the Queenes Maiestie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
